title: In addition to above, other ancillary area FSI as mentioned in notes below Table No
clause_text: In addition to above, other ancillary area FSI as mentioned in notes below Table No.6-A and 6-G (whichever is applicable) shall also be applicable for these uses.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: In addition to above, other ancillary area FSI as mentioned in notes below Table No.6-A and 6-G (whichever is applicable) shall also be applicable for these uses.
